text: #powercut #Redland #BS6 & surrounding areas. We're sorry for the delay in restoring power, our engineers are working to have all properties back on by 07:30.  Siân
There is currently a #powercut in #BS6 #Redland & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 06:30. Siân.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to the #Castlethorpe #MK19 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Andi.
We are aware of a #powercut in the #Castlethorpe #MK19 and surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 16:30. Andi.
All customers affected by the #powercut in #Newcastle #ST5 now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused. Owen
Apologies to customers affected by the #powercut at #Newcastle #ST5 and the surrounding area. Engineers estimate 11:00 to restore the power.
We are aware that properties are without power in #Wenvoe #CF5 & surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 06:00. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut
We are aware that properties are without power in #Bristol #BS3 & surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 06:00. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut
We are aware that properties are without power in #Saltash #PL12 & surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 23:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut
All supplies to #EX8 #Exmouth have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut. Ian
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #SA15 #Llanelli area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #Exmouth #EX8. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 12:00.  Siân
All customers affected by the #powercut in #PL7 #Plymouth now have their supply restored. Our apologies for any inconvenience caused.
There is currently a #powercut in #SA15 #Llanelli & surrounding areas. We are working on the issue and we estimate to have the power restored by 10:30.  Siân.

We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Lichfield #WS14 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
We are sorry about the #powercut in the #Lichfield #WS14 and surrounding area. Our team is working on the issue and we aim to restore supplies by 13:00. Andi.
We're sorry to customers affected by the #powercut in the #Blaengarw #CF32 and surrounding area. We estimate that all customers will have power restored by 16:00. Andi.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Repton #DE65 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut. Geraint
Power is now back on in #Stroud #GL5 and surrounding areas.  We are sorry for any problems caused by the #powercut this morning.
